definition: A unit of time that typically refers to a period of 365 days, used to measure the duration between two specific events or to mark the passage of time. It is commonly employed to indicate the age of a person or the duration of a project, event, or historical period.

examples.german: Ich habe ihn letztes Jahr getroffen.

examples.english: We celebrate New Year's Eve every year.

examples.german: Sie ist seit einem Jahr verheiratet.
examples.english: She has been married for a year.
